title: PESEdit Patch 2014 v2.0
description:
PESEdit Patch 2014 v2.0
 <a href="
http://scrin.org/i/13/09/11abfc37374097.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://scrin.org/i/13/09/11abfc37374097.png</a> 

Info:



Name the game: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014
Genre: Soccer 3D
Release date patch 2014
Type of patch: Official
Software Version: 2.0
Required version of the game: no matter
Author / Developer: PESEdit





CHANGELOG




New commands - Rubin Kazan, Spartak Moscow, Fenerbahce, Dynamo Kiev
New faces: 800 persons from Konami DLC; well as new faces for Achahbar, Chiriches, Klos, Lucas Moura, Morrison, Rebic, Townsend and many others
New forms: 1860 Munchen, Bielefeld, Colombia, Denmark, Everton, France, Germany, Hoffenheim, Japan, Mexico, Russia, Scotland, Spain, Sweden, Wales
New shoes: Adidas adiPure 11pro, Puma King, Mizuno Morelia II and Mizuno Wave Cup SS
Miscellaneous: Fixed problem with duplicate players in Master League mode (Subotic, van der Vaart and others)




Installation
If you already have a previous version of the patch , it is recommended to delete the folder in the root directory FileLoader games (eg C :/ Program Files (x86) / Games / PES 2014 / )

If you have not installed PES Data Pack 2.0 , you must install it from the beginning . To do this, copy the files dt50_001.cpk ( Data Pack 1.0) and dt500_7999999.cpk ( Data Pack 2.0) :
'C :/ ProgramData / KONAMI / Pro Evolution Soccer 2014/download ' (Windows 7/8)
'C :/ Dosuments and Settings / All Users / Application Data / KONAMI / Pro Evolution Soccer 2014/download' (Windows XP).

1. Start 2014 PESEdit Patch v2.0.exe
2 . Follow the instructions to the installer
3 . Select pes2014.exe you want to use (. Exe v1.04 without NoDvd)
4 . play

Currently available two second division (English and German ) , to switch between them :
1. Start PESEdit Selector
2 . Click on the tab 2nd Divizions
3 . Select the desired Division and click Install.
